name: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Kizuna Drive
description: Experience four-player team combat with NARUTO SHIPPUDEN™: Kizuna Drive! Create your ideal team from the many fan-favorite playable characters available and as battles wage, take your co-op offensives to the next level by engaging the devastating Kizuna Drive combat system! And with original story, mulitplayer capabilities and tons of collectibles, NARUTO SHIPPUDEN™: Kizuna Drive delivers an intense and exhilarating team-based fighting experience!
